name: Orbs (itch) (Kijo)
description:
Okey, i worked a lot on this game for a Jam, but i arrived very late and  the jam close the sumbission, so i finished late  the game. A simple platforms with Pixel Art graphics, its about a astronaut who need get 5 combustible for his Spaceship and go out the cavern who trapped. 

Move = A, D  Jump = W

Programmed by: Kijo

Music by: Kijo

Art by: Kijo

If you are interested in following my projects, I invite you to my server of discord with this link: https://discord.gg/aayRKnQ
